title: I think using any of the following champion should automatically result in a permaban

replies.body: I wonder why {{champion:55}} isn't shown... *Sarcasm*

Nah, Katarina is cool. For reasons.
http://i.imgur.com/CPFakg7.gif?Noredirect.
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/UTOuQeVV19I/maxresdefault.jpg
you mean the over all lack of anyone playing her or....the other thing {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

more like the overall amount of a certain someone playing with her. 

*wink wink*

*nudge nudge*
_playing_
{{champion:36}} ?
He lives in Noxus, and fights for the Noxian military. Sounds like scum to me.
i thought he was from zaun

He was born and raised in Zaun, but joined the Noxus as the Noxian military was impressed with his work, and wanted to build relations between the two factions. He now lives in the Noxian capital, and is allowed to continue his experiments as long as he serves the Noxian government.
then where is singed. he did stuff for noxus as well.
{{champion:82}} Hue!
Hue!
Evict those Noxian scum from MY Immortal Bastion, fool!
Here is the question though: If the Immortal Bastion was cleansed with the holy light of Demacia, would Mord still want it?
It would take some refurbishing but nothing beats returning home after being abroad for so long.
That's true. Just commit an act of unspeakable evil in every room, and you can make it unholy in no time.

I'll be done in no time!

Just wear crocs with socks and walk through the entire Bastion.
The thing would be cozily unholy in mere minutes-
That might be going too far, even for Mord. You want to make it evli, but don't want Bard to wipe it from existence.
My brother's a Bard Main. He can probably talk some sense into him or keep him busy with a studio Ghibli marathon while I commit acts of unspeakable horror.
Alright, just be careful. Whenever Shen sees crocs he gets a hungry that only surgery will sate.

Shen, where are his hands?

My stomach was making the rumblies,
that only hands could satisfy
Obligatory pedantry: Mundo is from Zaun. Also you forgot to include {{champion:55}} and {{champion:92}}
Calling Riven Noxian scum is an insult to Noxian scum. Also, Katarina is awesome and you know it.

>Katarina is awesome and you know it.

That seems unusual for a Demacian to say... ;-)

I have my reasons.
http://i.imgur.com/CPFakg7.gif?Noredirect

Nah she is totally cool. Any Garen main knows Katarina doesn't counter as scum.

...


_(shipping intensifies)_

{{champion:58}} ''As I live, all will die!''

{{champion:58}}  + {{item:3026}} + {{champion:26}} + {{champion:117}} + {{champion:16}} + {{champion:44}} = guarenteed win.
The logic is flawless.
Flaw in the logic is that logically the rest of his team will all die, too, as Renekton still lives.
Yeah but then renek takes the Nexus
Exactly.
I want my Noxian Sergeant support spouting Dawn of War quotes. Even with Braum and Taric, the roster is still full of estrogen and not enough Noxus!

{{champion:86}} is the manliest man. Nothing is more manly than justice. 
https://media.giphy.com/media/uR6julmSW90mk/giphy.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=VYBak9EE,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-05-16T17:05:19.928+0000)
>
> {{champion:86}} is the manliest man. Nothing is more manly than justice. 
> https://media.giphy.com/media/uR6julmSW90mk/giphy.gif

Garen always beats me in lane... P-Part of me enjoys it...

I love this gif
have my upvote
https://m.popkey.co/504d30/YNmao.gif

{{champion:6}} has mixed feelings. On the one hand, at least Garen knows he exists so he doesn't feel too upset at being forgotten by the man who murdered him. On the other hand, he's still seen as scum.
Sadgot.

Urgot to be kinder to the poor zombie tick. 

http://whofedthischamp.com/images/uploads/106/Sad-Urgot-is-sad-full.jpg
Oh dear god, that picture makes those quotes a thousand times worse, I never thought there would be a day that Urgod would hit me in the feels.
If Mundo goes where he pleases, can Garen's justice stop him?

That depends. If Mundo decided he pleased to walk into a bush, Garen could show him justice before he had time to please himself elsewhere. But if Mundo saw Garen coming he would please to go elsewhere, and nobody could stop him.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=VYBak9EE,comment-id=00110000,timestamp=2016-05-16T20:39:16.102+0000)
>
> Garen could show him justice before he had time to please himself elsewhere.

Thank you for clearing that up ;)
but what if mundo went to the bush before garen got there and stole garen's tv.
Impossible. Garen is already in every bush.

_I think riot should make the max length of discussions longer. Resetting duration from here again._

alas, those were not for garen, but for the only man that has ever successfully evicted garen. {{champion:107}}
Impossible. If Rengo tries to stealth when attacking Garen, he will just spin an slay all villains in the region.

garen can't stop rengar from claiming a bush. rengar has his ways.

http://i787.photobucket.com/albums/yy151/ourlordcometh/Neocrisis/Article%20Images%202/funny-gif-cat-paw-couch.gif

What Rengar doesn't know is that Garen is already in the bush, hiding behind him. But since Garen is not a villain, Garen decided to spare him.

http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2011/192/5/8/garen_in_a_bush_by_alajamsch-d3n01ai.jpg
